calldatasize_gift_for_Mikle: 0x4
issues.description:
The function `GetGift()` executes the SUICIDE instruction. The remaining Ether is sent to the caller's address.

There is a check on storage index 1. This storage index can be written to by calling the function `SetGiftFor(address)`.
issues.title: Unchecked SUICIDE
